title: Lamamra holds bilateral meetings on the sidelines of its participation in the ROME-MED Forum
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and the National Community Abroad, Mr. Ramtane Lamamra, had, on Friday in the Italian capital, several bilateral meetings as part of his participation in the 8th High-Level Forum for Dialogue in the Mediterranean (ROME-MED).

Mr. Lamamra met in particular with the US Principal Deputy Assistant Secretary for the Bureau of Near Eastern Affairs U, Yael Lempert, with the Personal Envoy of the UN Secretary-General for Western Sahara, Staffan de Mistura, as well as with the European Union Special Representative for the Middle East Peace Process, Sven Koopmans.

M. Lamamra also met with the Presidents of Italy Sergio Matarella, of Niger Mohamed Bazoum and of Mauritania Mohamed Ould Ghazouani, to whom he notably conveyed the fraternal greetings of President of the Republic Abdelmadjid Tebboune.
The three presidents asked Lamamra to transmit their heartfelt greetings to President Abdelmadjid Tebboune as well as their wishes for further prosperity to Algeria and its people.
